title: Trump to The Atlantic: 'I run the country and world'
shortDescription: President Trump said he's having more fun the second time around and again teased an unconstitutional third term in an interview with The Atlantic.

title: Biden bemoans 'politics of dehumanization' while praising Pope Francis
shortDescription: Joe Biden praises the late pontiff's humanity and for helping migrants, but also handed out light jabs at Donald Trump, in exclusive USA TODAY op-ed.

title: Trump wants to bring back Columbus Day. But did it ever leave?
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said he is bringing Columbus Day "back," but did it ever leave? What to know about the federal holiday.

title: Majority disapprove of Trump's job as president in latest NBC poll
shortDescription: A majority of 55% of survey respondents said they disapprove of President Donald Trump's first 100 days in office, while 45% said they approve.

title: Trump to sign executive orders bolstering law enforcement, immigration
shortDescription: Trump will sign two executive orders to bolster law enforcement and identify sanctuary cities as part of his tougher immigration enforcement.

title: Booker, Jeffries hold sit-in on Capitol steps, slam Trump budget plan
shortDescription: Plus: Secretary of State Marco Rubio was pressed Sunday by NBC News over child U.S. citizens removed from the country. | It's all on The Excerpt.

title: Putin declares 3-day ceasefire. That's not good enough, Trump says.
shortDescription: President Trump "wants to see a permanent ceasefire first, to stop the killing, stop the bloodshed," press secretary Karoline Leavitt said.

title: White House lines driveway with mugshot posters of immigrant arrests
shortDescription: The White House set up posters showing immigrant arrests as border czar Tom Homan promotes 'historic low' in border crossings.

title: Trump announces he is 'bringing back' Columbus Day
shortDescription: US President Donald Trump announced he is "bringing Columbus Day back from the ashes," claiming Democrats tried to destroy Christopher Columbusâ€™s legacy and that of Italian Americans.

title: Daily Briefing: Trump looms over Canada's election
shortDescription: The president's annexation threats and tariffs revive Canada's Liberals. Here is the news to know on Monday.

title: Made-for-TV presidency: How Trump's celebrity past shaped his first 100 days
shortDescription: From 'The Apprentice' to the White House, Donald Trump is using the skills he honed as a TV reality star and applying them to the presidency.

title: Made-for-TV moments from Trump's first 100 days
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has brought his TV showmanship to the White House for a second term with made-for-TV moments in his first 100 days.

title: Trump front and center as angry Canada votes
shortDescription: Donald Trump's annexation threats and tariffs loom large as Canadians head to the polls to pick their prime minister.

title: Rubio reiterates Trump's view Canada 'would be better off' as US state
shortDescription: "The president has stated repeatedly he thinks Canada would be better off as a state," Secretary of State Marco Rubio told NBC's "Meet the Press."

title: Trump says he's bringing back Columbus Day 'from the ashes'
shortDescription: President Trump said on social media that he's "bringing Columbus Day back from the ashes" and blamed Dems for ruining the explorer's "reputation."

title: Trump urges Putin to 'stop shooting' and sign deal with Ukraine
shortDescription: The Trump administration has tried to broker a peace deal between Ukraine and Russia to halt the three-year conflict.

title: Booker and Jeffries host sit-in at Capitol
shortDescription: Rep. Hakeem Jeffries and Sen. Cory Booker hosted an hours-long sit-in on the Capitol steps ahead of Congress resuming session.
